website_summaries.verdict: Are you new to using gas range protectors made of PTFE? These 6 protectors are great for consumers who want to give them a try.
pros: PTFE gas range protectors that can be washed and reused repeatedly
Easy to cut if you need to enlarge the pre-cut openings
Pack of 6 is affordable and a good choice for beginners
cons: May burn if the edges get too close to flames
Spills have been reported to ooze underneath, requiring prompt cleanup

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Prior to ordering this product I had purchased a "similar" set locally and was very dissatisfied with it but ordered this set on Amazon hoping they would be a better quality. Turns out the quality is much better and I'm sure these will last much longer. These sure make keeping the black range top cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some of the other reviewers, I've had very, very good luck with these. You have to cut the hole in the middle to fit your burner, but that's super easy. Make sure to cut the hole larger than you actually need so it stays away from the flame enough. Super easy to clean up too. I'd definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Vel

customer_reviews.title: They REALLY work!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they help keep the stove clean. If a pot overflows, I just take the cover and rinse it in the sink and put it right back on the stove. I love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Slick Non-stick Stove-top Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: You have to remember kindergarten crafting skills to cut them to fit but they do keep your stove clean and wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jira

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. It works great! The material is very flat. The first one when I cut the burner is not very good. The I use a marker to draw the curve first and then cut. Perfect match! I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Styling
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Cleans easily and does not look tacky
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with this item, easy to cut and install, keeping clean the stove and 100% washable...
customer_reviews.author: slash

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to use! Just measure out and cut to desired size and super easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome! I had some milk drip out of the pot and i had no worry about it booking and staining my range top. I was able to keep cooking and worry about clean up later. Makes my life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Olga P

customer_reviews.title: Good product and thin design
customer_reviews.text: Good product but larger than our stNdard size gas burners
customer_reviews.author: Jim P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy care for the stove
customer_reviews.text: We like them so much, we bought one set in black, the other in silver. Helps reduce the amount of work to clean the stove and prevents burned in food on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: good product!
customer_reviews.text: these things are pretty cool,saves alot of time and easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Covered up the scratched and ugly burner trays on my gas stove. They were pretty easy to cut to fit the burners and wipe clean fairly easy; much easier than scrubbing the metal ones with cleanser. I hope they hold up to usage.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Royball

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing and still love it!
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this. I love that this is washable and can be customized/cut to size y pi u want. This is one of the best purchase I did.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: love these liners they keep my stove looking spic and span, very easy to cut
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in good condition. Had to cut them but was easy to cut. They fit perfect and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking stove now!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my stove top. Very easy to cut and shape and looks so much better than the old plates! Haven’t had to wash them yet but hoping it washes well.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy top clean
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Blends in with the color of the cooktop and cleans easily in soap and water. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: KITCHEN MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super easy to clean. I was concerned that I had to cut them to fit them properly but it was really easy. So much more convenient to grab these and scrub them off as opposed to scrubbing away at my stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Bushra A.

customer_reviews.title: Great weight to these covers
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the thickness of these covers. Easy to cut, great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well so far so good ... just put them down and they seem easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to protect my new stove
customer_reviews.text: They came on time and were exactly as shown. It was easy to cut to fit but i wish i could have found some without holes in the middle since my burners are not perfectly centered. I've run them through the dishwasher with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Loigin

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The product is worth the money and this will help you lots of time in cleaning your gas stove top. can be easily put on and seems like you can wash them easily as well. the sizes can be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality,they would definitely be durable/reusable,would highly recommend,I bought a cheaper pack first and they lasted 5 mins.these are great.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Best way to keep your stove burner top clean! Just cut to fit your burner top and remove about one el a week to be cleaned
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo E. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the stove but could be couple of inches bigger
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover for the stove. Tried lighting it. Did not catch fire. But still followed all the instructions. The only issue is that it does not fit all stove.
customer_reviews.author: Narayanan Sangameswaran

customer_reviews.title: Need to cut to fit
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. Had to cut some of them so it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Wu

customer_reviews.title: These work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to customize. But they do clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us - easy to wipe clean with soapy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for us - easy to wipe clean with soapy sponge - no more solving to get ceramic top to shine.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: East to cut the perfect fit. Haven't cooked yet (since it just arrive,)
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Same product at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered burner liners similar to these before @ twice the price. Exactly the same items with *slightly* different packaging as liners listed for $15+. These would probably last me longer but I usually lose a liner to a minor cooking catastrophe before it actually wears out. Still extremely useful for saving time and effort cleaning the kitchen & the price is a bonus- Don't get caught over-spending!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Busiere

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like having to cut them to fit my stove
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like having to cut them to fit my stove. They don’t look as good as if they had been already sized.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, quick to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had initially ordered one a year back or so; then we switched houses and ordered a new one. It has clearly mentioned instructions to cut / customize as per your gas burner. And in no time, they are ready for use. Usually one can clean with wet (soaked / sprinkled with water) tissue but if you have thick / bad stains coz of oil or sauce, a nice wash with soap / detergent brings it back to original shine. Definitely recommend this product. No more scrubbing of gas tops anymore with mesh or scotchbrite.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Malhotra

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a little while...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a few weeks, and then I started to notice small white burn spots. Then they burned through completely. I wish they really worked. It's a good idea and I liked them, but they don't last.
customer_reviews.author: EPayne

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They can be cut to fit and when they get dirty rinse them off in the sink quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: DEB COX

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for at least 5 months. No complaints so far. Very easy to use, very easy to clean. So far, it appears to be really heat resistant. I will update if something wrong happens. If without updates, it means no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio J.

customer_reviews.title: They do help keep my old stove clean
customer_reviews.text: pro: washable, icky goop slides right off when washed. con: i have a white stove. these are black-nuff said on that point. It was hard to cut the circle correctly. other than that, i would buy them again. they are very durable and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: P. Alscher

customer_reviews.title: Wife Doesn't Yell at Me as Much
customer_reviews.text: You have to make sure it doesn't block the burner holes when you install.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky_Mtn_High

customer_reviews.title: honestly isn't great
customer_reviews.text: yes it is easy to install, doesn't help prevent spills from getting under the mat so just means a bigger mess to clean up. Not worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Moontones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut and install. Material is thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Wish this was made with a thicker material and a little bigger quantity. Other than that, you just cut them to fit around your stove top. I was not able to complete my whole stove with this one pack, but was able to cover most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cauterizer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is a huge help keeping the gas stove clean around the burners, and they wash with hot soapy water (i put them in a sink of water), and they don't seem to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: SGMitch

customer_reviews.title: Silicone stove top
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was excellent! The instructions how to fit the product on stove is clearly explained right on the packaging and was very easy to follow great product
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (have to measure and cut as needed) and worth the price..no more spills on the base
customer_reviews.author: Lavanya K

customer_reviews.title: I would pass
customer_reviews.text: I mean if I want I could have just put down foil but thought I’d give these a try they are not a very good match for my stove and makes the flames shoot up higher for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy but does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Super clean
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut a bunch to fit my stove. User error in my purchase but they make my stove look brand new. Very easy to wipe up spills. Will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer gorman-stokes

customer_reviews.title: Tough fit
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would of fit my stove better. You have to cut them and if you don't do it perfectly, you'll burn through them and need to replace them quickly. When done right, they'll look great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard DiGeorge

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble cutting out the holes but they came out just okay. They are really easy to clean. I just rinse them under the water and everything comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Better than foil? 🤔
customer_reviews.text: They weren't as thick or heavy as I'd hope so they slide around to easily which can defeat the purpose. I got them for a long price but I would've preferred to pay more for either higher quality material or custom cut.
customer_reviews.author: Buckaroo Lou

customer_reviews.title: Threw them away
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 burner gas stove which has a long burner in the middle. These did not fit well and looked cheap. I threw them away and never used. Good luck to you though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: 10x better than aluminum foil cover
customer_reviews.text: I had a few different burner covers and this works the best. Like the aluminum cover, it’s very light and easy to clean, but looks a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Young

customer_reviews.title: Gas Stove Liners
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet, but they look like they will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worthless!!! I don't understand why people even buy it. I bought different Brands just to test it out. None performed as it should.
customer_reviews.author: QuadRat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you can cut the sheets well
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are a cutting expert don’t buy. You have to cut the sheets perfectly to fit over the stove. (Mine were not perfect) if you didn’t cut it well enough the food would just go under the sheet and make a bigger mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fit. Good value for the product. Keeps my stove clean when I need to replace
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Aguda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: You have to cut it to fit your stove. Too bad this product made the bottoms of my pots and pans BLACK and it is soo hard to clean it. Not worth your money. I mignt as well clean my stove then.
customer_reviews.author: David Figuera

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like
customer_reviews.text: Did not care much for these protectors. Had to cut them just didn’t cut right!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Had to trim ALOT to get a fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a normal sized stove and I had to do a lot of trimming and modifying to get this to fit on my stove. The process was so frustrating I finally just threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Denison

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy these but the one piece next.
customer_reviews.text: Helps with cleanup. Will probably buy the one piece cover next time.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. W.

customer_reviews.title: works great, hate cleaning the stove, easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Tip - trace your grill grate with a ball point pen to get cutting lines
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Stove top gas burner covers
customer_reviews.text: These were difficult to cut and get a good fit around the burners. It is way more expensive but the precut ones might be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and worth the price to help keep my stovetop clean.
customer_reviews.author: mary glanton

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars just because I received only 4 covers instead of 6 as mentioned in the title of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jatin Kale

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to cut and looks very ugly once it is. Does not fit stovetop burners well and uneven placement. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Puddin'

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Hate it! Doesn’t fit and hard to cut into the shape you want. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Gia Yang

customer_reviews.title: Too much work to just them to fit my stove
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I did not like about those the holes are too small a difficult time cutting them to fit my stove
customer_reviews.author: not happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s an easy May to clean and my stove is a bit clean. I have to cut mine since I’m using it for a stove on my rv. I like that I’m able to cut it down to the size I need.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Is not convenient
customer_reviews.text: It's too much trouble. I have to cut them one by one!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: It b is not working
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it It is hard to clean Hard to install I use it for my stove
customer_reviews.author: selsabil

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, odd texture
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy. Did not feel they were safe to use. Almost felt like they were just coated paper. I would’ve thought they were silicone or something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R B

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous!! Saves me from scrubbing the stove after I cook. Very easy to cut and if you do spill no biggie, just rinse off!
customer_reviews.author: Staci G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product you don’t have to scrape it’s easily cleanedWith soap and water no chemicals👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reusable Stove liners
customer_reviews.text: Quality is horrible. Does not last long at all. Wears out after a coupl of washes. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to buy this product. It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Keibway

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to cut neatly, was too much work getting it to look nice on the stove. I threw the product away
customer_reviews.author: Donya

customer_reviews.title: did not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: they move around too much and allowed spilt food to get underneath the covers
customer_reviews.author: Richard Palafox

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very good, it’s the convenience of being able to protect stove and clean easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amavely Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered six and received only five! Disappointed. Not worth the hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. They were to big and when trying to cut, it ended up being a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: terrible looking product looks tacky, very difficult to cut with scissors to make it look presentable. waist of money, wish i could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: You have to cut big round circles to make sure it won't burn,because it will.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not easy
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible time trying to cut them to the stove size I end up throwing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. After getting them cut to fit they kept getting air pockets underneath them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Proudfoot

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. They are thin and cheap. Don’t hold up well to a gas stove either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome invention!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! This has always been a pet peeve of mine! The mess under the burners! I ordered a second set for my mother in law!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Fits big stove but can be cut to fit smaller stove top
customer_reviews.text: what i like about this gas stove burner covers is that it is easy to clean. definitely waterproof. This came bigger than my stove burners but it was easy to cut and fit the right size of my burners. This is really a necessity for your stove tops like a phone case for your phone. best is the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: MT

product_meta.title: v cool livat Gas Range Stove Burner Covers - 0.3mm Thick 6 Pack 10.6inch Black Stovetop Liners Protectors Non-Stick Cuttable Dishwasher Safe Easy to Clean
feature_bullets: DURABLE & DISHWASHER SAFE - The Stove Burner Covers Are Easy To Clean With Soapy Warm Water
THICKER AND EASIER TO CUT - The Gas Range Protectors Are The Latest Upgrade, Thicker And Easier To Cut Down To Fit The Burner
NON-STICK & HEAT RESISTANT - The Stove Burner Covers Are Non Stick to Keep Your Stove Clean at Any Time And Heat Resistant
PREMIUM QUALITY - The Stovetop Cover liners/Gas Range Protectors Are Made of PTFE Coated Fiberglass

specifications.Special Features: Stemless, All Cookware, Electric Stovetop Compatible, Microwave Safe, Dishwasher Safe, Permanent Filter, Pre-Seasoned, Slow Cookers, Breadmachines, Coffee Makers, Programmable, Gas Stovetop Compatible, Induction Stovetop Compatible, Converts to Hand Mixer, Thermal
specifications.Compatible Device: Gas range protector, Stove burner cover
specifications.Certification: Stove burner cover gas range protector
specifications.Included Components: OPP bag package, Gas range protector, PTFE, Stove burner cover
